ComicInfo.Summary: The Dragon mysteriously finds himself in San Futuro in the year 2022, where he is attacked by the mischevious Gangreene, who believe him to be "The Commandment Killer," a serial murderer that has killed Mako, Star III, Justice, and other locals. With the aid of SFPD officer Marshal Law, The Dragon heads off in search of the real killer.
ComicInfo.Title: Compiled both issues
